entry.content: å‰æ®µæ—¶é—´æäº† Vueï¼Œç°åœ¨åˆå¾—å¼€å§‹å†™ React äº†ã€‚ æˆ‘å ‚å ‚çš„ä¸€ä¸ªåç«¯ï¼ŒçœŸæ˜¯å¤ªæ®‹å¿å•¦ o(â•¯â–¡â•°)o æ¥è§¦è¿‡ Vue çš„åº”è¯¥éƒ½çŸ¥é“ï¼ŒVue çš„çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†å¯ä»¥æœ‰ä¸¤ç§å®ç°ï¼Œä¸€ç§æ˜¯ Vuexï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ç§æ˜¯ eventBus å½¢å¼ã€‚ React çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†ï¼Œè€ç‰Œçš„åº”è¯¥æ˜¯ Reduxï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å­˜åœ¨äº†å¤ªå¤šçš„æ¦‚å¿µï¼Œå¯¹äºåˆšæ¥è§¦çš„ç«¥é‹ä¸å¤ªå‹å¥½ã€‚mobx å½“å±æ—¶ä»£çš„æ–°æ˜Ÿäº†ã€‚ä¸ç®¡ä»æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯æ˜“è¯»æ€§éƒ½è¿œè¶… Reduxã€‚ ä¸‹é¢å¸¦æ¥ä¿©å°ğŸŒ°å¤§å®¶æ„Ÿå—ä¸‹~~ æœ€ç®€å•çš„ä¸€ä¸ª redux æ“ä½œ123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627import {createStore} from 'redux';const ADD_ACTION = 'ADD';const add = (num) => { return { type: ADD_ACTION, num };};const initialState = { count: 0};const reducers = (state = initialState, action) => { switch (action.type) { case ADD_ACTION: return Object.assign({}, state, {count: state.count + action.num}); default: return state; }};const reduxStore = createStore(reducers);reduxStore.dispatch(add(1)); æœ€ç®€å•çš„ä¸€ä¸ª mobx æ“ä½œ12345678910import {observable, action} from 'mobx';const mobxStore = observable({ count: 0, add: action((num) => { this.count += num; })});mobxStore.add(1);

// 2. è®¡æ•°å™¨ï¼Œç”¨äºåˆ¤å®šè¾¹ç•Œ private AtomicInteger count = new AtomicInteger(0); private final int minSize = 0; // 3. åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”¨äºåŠ é” private final Object lock = new Object(); private final int maxSize; public MyQueue(int maxSize) { this.maxSize = maxSize; } /** * æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ åˆ°é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æœé˜Ÿåˆ—å…ƒç´ å·²æ»¡ï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨æ­¤æ–¹æ³•çš„çº¿ç¨‹è¢«é˜»å¡ï¼Œç›´åˆ°å­˜åœ¨å¤šä½™ç©ºé—´äº†ï¼Œå†è¿›è¡Œæ·»åŠ * * @param obj æ·»åŠ obj åˆ°é˜Ÿåˆ—å°¾éƒ¨ */ public void put(Object obj) { synchronized (lock) { // 1.æ²¡æœ‰å¤šä½™ç©ºé—´ï¼Œå°±é˜»å¡çº¿ç¨‹ while (count.get() == this.maxSize) { try { lock.wait(); } catch (InterruptedException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } // 2.æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ queue.add(obj); // 3.è®¡æ•°å™¨ç´¯åŠ count.incrementAndGet(); System.out.println(StrUtil.format("æ–°åŠ å…¥çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ºï¼š{}", obj)); // 4.å”¤é†’å…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹ï¼ˆè‹¥æœ¬æ¥å…ƒç´ ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œæœ‰çº¿ç¨‹è°ƒç”¨ get æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåŸæœ¬è¢«é˜»å¡çš„ï¼Œéœ€è¦åœ¨æ­¤æ—¶è¢«å”¤é†’ï¼‰ lock.notify(); } } /** * è·å–ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¦‚æœé˜Ÿåˆ—å…ƒç´ ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨æ­¤æ–¹æ³•çš„çº¿ç¨‹è¢«é˜»å¡ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ·»åŠ æ–°å…ƒç´ äº†ï¼Œå†è¿›è¡Œè·å– * * @return è¿”å›é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ */ public Object get() { Object ret = null; synchronized (lock) { // 1.æ²¡æœ‰å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå°±é˜»å¡çº¿ç¨‹ while (count.get() == this.minSize) { try { lock.wait(); } catch (InterruptedException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } // 2.å–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ret = queue.removeFirst(); // 3.è®¡æ•°å™¨é€’å‡ count.decrementAndGet(); System.out.println(StrUtil.format("ç§»é™¤çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ºï¼š{}", ret)); // 4.å”¤é†’å…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹ï¼ˆè‹¥å…ƒç´ æœ¬æ¥å·²æ»¡ï¼Œæœ‰çº¿ç¨‹è°ƒç”¨ put æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåŸæœ¬è¢«é˜»å¡çš„ï¼Œéœ€è¦åœ¨æ­¤æ—¶è¢«å”¤é†’ï¼‰ lock.notify(); } return ret; } public int getSize() { return this.count.get(); }} æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ç±» MyQueueTest.javaï¼Œæµ‹è¯•ç±»ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œå¹¶å°†å…ƒç´ å¡«æ»¡ï¼Œç„¶åå¯åŠ¨ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ t1ï¼Œå»æ’å…¥æ•°æ®ï¼Œä¸­é—´ä¼‘çœ 2sï¼Œå†å»å¯åŠ¨ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ t2 å–æ•°æ®ã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536import com.xiaoleilu.hutool.util.StrUtil;import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;public class MyQueueTest { public static void main(String[] args) { final MyQueue queue = new MyQueue(5); } t2.start(); }} å¯åŠ¨æµ‹è¯•ç±»ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¿è¡Œç»“æœã€‚æ§åˆ¶å°å¦‚æœåº”è¯¥å‡ºç°çš„æ•ˆæœæ˜¯ï¼Œé˜Ÿåˆ—å…ˆåˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆï¼Œç„¶åä¼‘çœ 2sï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥å…ˆå–æ•°æ®ï¼Œå†æ’å…¥æ•°æ®ï¼Œåˆ™è¯æ˜é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯æ§åˆ¶å°è¿è¡Œçš„æ•ˆæœï¼š åˆå§‹åŒ–é˜Ÿåˆ— ä¼‘çœ 2såå–é˜Ÿé¦–å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå†æ’å…¥é˜Ÿå°¾å…ƒç´ æ­¤æ—¶æˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šå‘ç°ï¼Œç¨‹åºè¿˜æœªåœæ­¢ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ­¤æ—¶é˜Ÿåˆ—å·²æ»¡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯çº¿ç¨‹ t1 è¿˜æœªæ’å…¥ h å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå› æ­¤çº¿ç¨‹è¢«é˜»å¡ç€ï¼Œç›´è‡³ä¸‹æ¬¡é˜Ÿåˆ—æœ‰ç©ºä½™ç©ºé—´æ‰ä¼šè¢«å”¤é†’ã€‚ è‡³æ­¤ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªå®šä¹‰é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—å°±å·²ç»å®ç°äº†ã€‚ ç»†å¿ƒçš„æœ‹å‹ä¼šå‘ç°ï¼Œæˆ‘æ‰“å°çš„ log é‡Œç”¨åˆ°äº†ä¸€ä¸ª StrUtil.format() æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå’Œ slf4j çš„ log ç”¨æ³•ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å ä½ç¬¦ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯ç”¨åˆ°äº†ä¸€ä¸ªå›½äº§è‰¯å¿ƒå·¥å…·ç±»ï¼Œhutoolï¼Œå›½äº§å¼€æºï¼Œéœ€è¦å¤§å®¶çš„æ”¯æŒï¼Œè§‰å¾—å¥½ç”¨çš„è¯ï¼ŒæœŸæœ›å¯ä»¥å» ç äº‘ æˆ–è€… github ä¸Šç»™ä¸ª Star å§ï¼

entry.content: ç¼˜ç”±ï¼šä»Šå¤©å¥½å‹æ‹¿ç€ä¸‹é¢çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œé—®æˆ‘ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆMap.Entry è¿™ä¸ªæ¥å£æ²¡æœ‰å®ç° getKey() å’Œ getValue() æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå´å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œç”±æ­¤ï¼Œå¼€å¯äº†ä¸€ç•ªæŸ¥é˜… JDK æºç çš„æ—…é€”â€¦. 12345678910111213Map map = new HashMap(); map.put(1, "å¼ ä¸‰");map.put(2, "æå››");map.put(3, "ç‹äº”");map.put(4, "èµµå…­");map.put(5, "é’±ä¸ƒ"); Set set = map.entrySet();for (Object object : set) { Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) object; System.out.println(entry.getKey() + "-->" + entry.getValue());} é¦–å…ˆï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬çœ‹ map å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ª map å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯ HashMap çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå®ä¾‹ï¼Œç„¶åä¸‹é¢çš„ Set set = map.entrySet(); å¯ä»¥çŸ¥é“è¿™å…¶å®ç”¨çš„ HashMap å®ç°çš„ entrySet() æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥æŸ¥çœ‹ HashMap é‡Œ entrySet() çš„æºç ä»æºç å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œè¿™é‡Œçš„è¿”å›äº†ä¸€ä¸ª EntrySet å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ª EntrySet æ˜¯ HashMap é‡Œçš„ä¸€ä¸ªå†…éƒ¨ç±»ï¼Œæºç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051final class EntrySet extends AbstractSet<Map.Entry<K,V>> { public final int size() { return size; } public final void clear() { HashMap.this.clear(); } public final Iterator<Map.Entry<K,V>> iterator() { return new EntryIterator(); } public final boolean contains(Object o) { if (!(o instanceof Map.Entry)) return false; Map.Entry<?,?> e = (Map.Entry<?,?>) o; Object key = e.getKey(); Node<K,V> candidate = getNode(hash(key), key); return candidate != null && candidate.equals(e); } public final boolean remove(Object o) { if (o instanceof Map.Entry) { Map.Entry<?,?> e = (Map.Entry<?,?>) o; Object key = e.getKey(); Object value = e.getValue(); return removeNode(hash(key), key, value, true, true) != null; } return false; } public final Spliterator<Map.Entry<K,V>> spliterator() { return new EntrySpliterator<>(HashMap.this, 0, -1, 0, 0); } public final void forEach(Consumer<? super Map.Entry<K,V>> action) { Node<K,V>[] tab; if (action == null) throw new NullPointerException(); if (size > 0 && (tab = table) != null) { int mc = modCount; for (int i = 0; i < tab.length; ++i) { for (Node<K,V> e = tab[i]; e != null; e = e.next) action.accept(e); } if (modCount != mc) throw new ConcurrentModificationException(); } }} ä»è¿™é‡Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œè¿™ä¸ª EntrySet å…¶å®æ˜¯å°è£…çš„ä¸€ä¸ª Node ç±»çš„å®ä½“ã€‚ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ set å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ª Node å¯¹è±¡ã€‚ ç°åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬æ¥è¯´è¯´è¿™ä¸ª Node å¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒNode å¯¹è±¡ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ HashMap é‡Œçš„ä¸€ä¸ªå†…éƒ¨ç±»ï¼Œæºç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647static class Node<K,V> implements Map.Entry<K,V> { final int hash; final K key; V value; Node<K,V> next; Node(int hash, K key, V value, Node<K,V> next) { this.hash = hash; this.key = key; this.value = value; this.next = next; } public final K getKey() { return key; } public final V getValue() { return value; } public final String toString() { return key + "=" + value; } public final int hashCode() { return Objects.hashCode(key) ^ Objects.hashCode(value); } public final V setValue(V newValue) { V oldValue = value; value = newValue; return oldValue; } public final boolean equals(Object o) { if (o == this) return true; if (o instanceof Map.Entry) { Map.Entry<?,?> e = (Map.Entry<?,?>)o; if (Objects.equals(key, e.getKey()) && Objects.equals(value, e.getValue())) return true; } return false; }} å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ª Node å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯ Map.Entry<K,V> çš„å®ç°ç±»ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°è¿™ä¸ª Node å¯¹è±¡å®ç°äº† getKey() å’Œ getValue() çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åé¢è°ƒç”¨çš„ entry.getKey() ä»¥åŠ entry.getValue() æ–¹æ³•å…¶å®éƒ½æ˜¯è°ƒç”¨çš„ Node å¯¹è±¡é‡Œçš„getKey() å’Œ getValue() æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œå°±æ˜¯ Java çš„å¤šæ€çš„ä¸€ç§è¡¨ç°ã€‚ è‡³æ­¤ï¼Œæ‰“å®Œæ”¶æªï¼

entry.title: helloworld
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
